data.title: QDD
data.description: Multi-player real-time online competitive games, users can layout football players and start a competition. You can exchange points by battles and get corresponding prizes.
data.responsibility: Responsible for the idea, project development and maintenance.

data.title: CBox
data.description: CBox is the most authoritative video client to watch CCTV(China Central Television) and dozens of Chinese local TV programs on the Internet. It has more than 300 million users and it is still growing.
data.responsibility: One of the project manager, responsible for product architecture, technical selection and development team management.

data.title: Thousand Dogs
data.description: A creative web application based on Wechat, users can create thousands of dogs through this SPA, then share their blessings to friends, and can have beauty contests with others. After the game went online, it was widely spread.
data.responsibility: Responsible for the idea, project development and maintenance.

data.title: 光影印章 / Time Signet
data.description: A Wechat app to add text to the photos to record the baby's age, days of acquaintance and times of going to the gym.
data.responsibility: Ideas, prototyping, design, coding and implementation.

data.title: Crunching
data.description: A casual game which was designed and developed by myself and released it on the AppStore. The cumulative number of downloads has exceeded one million.
data.responsibility: From creativity, prototyping to design, development and implementation, all are completed and maintained by myself.

data.title: Endless Nails
data.description: A leisure game which was designed and developed by myself and released it on the AppStore. The cumulative number of downloads has exceeded 36 thousand.
data.responsibility: From creativity, prototype to art design and development, all are completed by myself.

data.title: Charging Spacecraft
data.description: A casual action game for charging spacecraft to navigate in the interstellar space.
data.responsibility: From creativity, prototyping to design, development and implementation, all are completed by myself.

data.title: Pew Pew Pew
data.description: An indie game which illustrates a story of a web developer who dive in web world and save his inspiration.
data.responsibility: From creativity, prototyping to design, development and implementation, all are completed by myself.

data.title: Showstopper Basketball
data.description: Flash 3D basketball game, in this game you can manage your team, upgrade your players, and dunk on your opponents all from Facebook.
data.responsibility: Responsible for the development of core game logic and UI animation effects of the game.

data.title: eingzone.com
data.description: Blog widget personalized music player website, users can DIY and share music player. User can choose hundreds of music player styles. The highest number of registered users reached 2000 per day, and the total number of registered users exceeded 1.5 million.
data.responsibility: Ideas, prototyping, design, coding and implementation, it's all done and maintained by myself.

data.title: Online Customer Service System
data.description: This online customer service system includes live broadcast, online whiteboard and chatting features.
data.responsibility: Participate in product design, mainly responsible for the development, implementation and maintenance of the project.
